item.title: k8s结合Jenkins与gitlab代码升级与回滚
item.author: Ryan
item.description: k8s结合Jenkins与gitlab代码升级与回滚 一、jenkins环境准备 1.1 安装jdk17 tar -xf jdk-17.0.9_linux-x64.tar.gz -C /opt ## 配置环境变量 vim /etc/profile.d/java.sh JAVA_HOME=/opt/jdk-17.0.9 CLASSPATH=.:$JAVA_HOME/lib/jrt-fs.jar PATH=$PATH:$JAVA_HOME/bin source /etc/
